text: Ani tyancyasi, tyance loka hujjata karu lagale. Paigambara (ibrahima) mhanale, kaya tumhi allahavisayi majhyasi vada ghalata. Vastavika tyane mala sarala marga dakhavila ahe ani jyanna tumhi allahasobata samila karata, mi tyance bhaya rakhata nahi, parantu he ki majha palanakarta ekhadya karanane icchila. Majhya palanakartyane pratyeka gostila apalya jnanakakseta gheralele ahe. Kaya tumhi tarihi vicara karita nahi
